function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Zoonotic diseases originating from wildlife and domestic animals","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conditions in peri-urban areas and highly urbanized centers favoring emergence of infectious diseases","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zoonotic viruses causing disease outbreaks through interspecific transmission from wild animals to humans","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding and mutation due to human disturbances to habitats and animal hosts","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of familiarity with campus buildings and keys may lead to increased contact and exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to communicable diseases","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation for air distribution","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient air distribution leading to temperature variations","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate prediction of infection probability in confined spaces","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on assumptions about droplet behavior and size","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited consideration of evaporation effects on infection probability","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of other significant paths of virus transmission, such as direct contact and droplet nuclei.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus spreading by droplets of different sizes","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited number of real cases used for model calibration","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sensitivity studies show reduced infection risk with occupancy rate reduction and social distancing","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low ventilation rates in indoor spaces","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 virus","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation rate leading to high infection risk","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standard-required minimum fresh air flow rate inadequate for risk mitigation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linear increase in infection risk with exposure time","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection probability in high-density occupancy areas","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in infection probability with occupancy ratio and exposure time","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain range of projected infection due to exposure time and location.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncalibrated infective quantum q in the modified model based on limited data from a single representative case","category":"Models","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of the distance between passengers on the bus","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncalculated or misestimated ventilation rate on the bus","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate q values for specific respiratory infectious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation of q value in different spaces with different population densities and ventilation systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider factors other than ventilation rate in the wells-riley model","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Evaporation altering the trajectory of droplets, increasing transmission distance","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate assessment of air distribution effectiveness ez in confined spaces","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of modified wells-riley model for predicting infection risk","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of droplets of different sizes over long distances","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate assessment of transmission distance due to evaporation effects","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on larger droplets and neglect of smaller droplets","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of water droplets in the air","category":"Water Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory droplets containing contagious diseases","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation effectiveness leading to higher infection rates","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate calibration of infective quantum in wells-riley model","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the distance respiratory droplets can travel","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in confined spaces","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control over probability of infection pi in relation to social distance and ventilation rate","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe for workers based on their specific risks, leading to insufficient protection from covid-19 exposure","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited facilities for self-quarantine and self-isolation, leading to challenges in preventing covid-19 transmission among workers","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of handwashing facilities with soap and alcohol-based hand rub","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling confirmed covid-19 cases in the workplace","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers with comorbidities are at a higher risk of covid-19 infection and severe complications.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in the workplace due to close contact and contact with contaminated surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coronavirus transmission through contaminated surfaces","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sustaining time of coronavirus on different metal surfaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"}]}
